attributes.action: Longer jail sentence for child abuse
attributes.additional_details: I think doing this the world will be a better place and a safer place to be able to let children be children it’s not fair on these poor family’s and children having to go through this
attributes.background:
After watching channel four under cover police..
They do not get long enough as they come out and repeat offend ..
Drug dealers got longer for abit of weed witch is used to help ill people ..
We need to make a change and everyone believes this to !

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Impose mandatory 10-year custodial sentences for all child sexual abuse offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556664

Mandatory life sentence for child sexual abuse: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562527

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for all crimes against children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/467154
